title: Publish QA Management app to IC mainnet and record public link

requirements.text: Complete a successful Internet Computer mainnet publish/deploy of the existing QA Management app and produce a shareable public website URL for the deployed frontend canister.

quotes: Domain QA-testing app by akash must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

acceptanceCriteria: A successful `dfx deploy --network ic` (or equivalent publish pipeline) run completes without the domain validation error
A public URL of the form `https://<frontend_canister_id>.icp0.io` is produced and shared as the live app link

requirements.text: Resolve the publish-time domain validation failure by ensuring the deployment/publish flow uses a domain/app name that is 5â€“50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens (e.g., normalize user-provided names by removing spaces and invalid characters).

quotes: Domain QA-testing app by akash must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

acceptanceCriteria: Publishing no longer fails due to the domain/app name containing spaces or other invalid characters
If an invalid name is provided, the flow clearly indicates the constraint in English and provides an example of a valid hyphenated name

requirements.text: After a successful mainnet deploy, update `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md` with the latest frontend and backend canister IDs and the generated public website link using the existing `frontend/scripts/recordDeploymentArtifact.js` script (or an equivalent automated step).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md` contains a non-empty `Live Application URL` entry
`frontend/DEPLOYMENT_LINKS.md` contains non-empty frontend and backend canister IDs
The recorded public URL matches the frontend canister ID in the same file (i.e., `https://<frontendId>.icp0.io`)

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn/ui sources).
Do not modify immutable frontend hook paths: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
nonGoals: Adding new product features (bugs/test cases/test runs) beyond enabling a successful publish and link recording
Changing authentication approach (Internet Identity remains the only supported auth)
